body_html:
Tensorflow 1.5 rc is built under cuda 9.1 and cudnn 7.0.5 under python 3.5 successfully.

I highly recommend arunmandal53's tutorial. "step by step installation of tensorflow with cuda 9.1 and cudnn7.05 on ubuntu". http://www.python36.com/install-tensorflow141-gpu/
body_text:
Tensorflow 1.5 rc  is built  under cuda 9.1 and cudnn 7.0.5 under python 3.5  successfully.
I highly recommend arunmandal53's tutorial. "step by step installation of tensorflow with cuda 9.1 and cudnn7.05 on ubuntu". http://www.python36.com/install-tensorflow141-gpu/
body:
Tensorflow 1.5 rc  is built  under cuda 9.1 and cudnn 7.0.5 under python 3.5  successfully.

I highly recommend arunmandal53's tutorial. "step by step installation of tensorflow with cuda 9.1 and cudnn7.05 on ubuntu". http://www.python36.com/install-tensorflow141-gpu/
